mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articles( article_title, article_avrPrice, article_maxPrice, article_minPrice, article_maxImgStr, article_minImgStr, article_maxArticleTitle, article_minArticleTitle, article_count) VALUE(#{itemTitle}, #{avrItemPrice}, #{maxItemPrice}, #{minItemPrice}, #{maxImgSrc}, #{minImgSrc}, #{maxArticleTitle}, #{minArticleTitle}, #{articleCount});
